background-color.comment: The background color of the Button component.

border-style.comment: The border style of the Button component.

border-width.comment: The border width of the Button component.

weight.comment: The font weight of the Button component.

line-height.comment: The line height of the Button component.

text-color.comment: The text color of the Button component.

visited-text-color.comment: The visited text color of the Button component.

border-radius.comment: The border radius of the Button component.

hover-background-color.comment: The background color of the Button component on hover.

hover-text-color.comment: The text color of the Button component on hover.

padding.comment: The padding of the Button component.

breakpoint-xs.comment: The extra small breakpoint at which Full Width Buttons switch to normal width.

breakpoint-s.comment: The small breakpoint at which Full Width Buttons switch to normal width.

transition-speed.comment: The transition speed setting for transitions on the Button component.

letter-spacing.comment: The letter spacing value of the Button component.

opacity.comment: The opacity value of the disabled Button component.
